code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'./Portfolio.css';import Menu from'./Menu';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Portfolio=()=>{const[items,setItem]=useState(Menu);const filterItem=categoryItem=>{const updatedItems=Menu.filter(curElem=>{return curElem.category===categoryItem;});setItem(updatedItems);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"work container section",id:"portfolio",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"section__title",children:"Projects"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"work__filters",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"work__item",onClick:()=>setItem(Menu),children:"Everything"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"work__item",onClick:()=>filterItem("WebApplication"),children:"Web Application"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"work__item",onClick:()=>filterItem("MobileApplication"),children:"Mobile Application"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"work__container grid",children:items.map(elem=>{const{id,image,title,category,link}=elem;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"work__card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"work__thumbnail",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:image,alt:"",className:"work__img"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"work__mask"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"work__category",children:category}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"work__title",children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:link,className:"work__button",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"icon-link work__button-icon"})})]},id);})})]});};export default Portfolio;
